data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Hard Crush
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Mantle Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

abilities.name: Evolutionary Flame
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Magmortar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Fire Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.text: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to Magmortar to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Hard Crush
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Mantle Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

data.name: Magmortar

abilities.name: Incandescent Body
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Fire Blaster
attacks.text: You may discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: From its arm, it launches fireballs hotter than 3,500 degrees Fahrenheit. Its arm starts to melt when it fires a whole barrage.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Flame Drum
attacks.text: If Magby isn't anywhere under Magmortar, discard 2 Energy cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 Energy cards from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Flame Screen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Flame Drum
attacks.text: If Magby isn't anywhere under Magmortar, discard 2 Energy cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 Energy cards from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Twin Bursts
attacks.text: If Electivire is on your Bench, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Top Burner
attacks.text: For each Fire Energy attached to Magmortar, discard the top card from your opponent's deck. Then, flip a coin. If tail, discard all Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

attacks.name: Burst Punch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

data.name: Magmortar

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.text: When you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Magmortar, remove 2 damage counters from Magmortar.

attacks.name: Flame Blast
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the number of Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

attacks.name: Fireball Bazooka
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: There are still quite a few factories that rely on the flames provided by Magmortar to process metals.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Burst Punch
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ground Burn
attacks.text: Each player discards the top card of their deck. This attack does 100 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: Magmortar takes down its enemies by shooting fireballs, which burn them to a blackened crisp. It avoids this method when hunting prey.

data.name: Magmortar LV.X
rules: Put this card onto your Active Magmortar. Magmortar LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

abilities.name: Torrid Wave
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Magmortar is your Active Pokémon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Burned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 2 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can't be used if Magmortar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flame Bluster
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) During your next turn, Magmortar can't use Flame Bluster.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Boltsplosion
attacks.text: If Electivire is on your Bench, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Boltsplosion
attacks.text: If Electivire is on your Bench, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.flavorText: Living in the crater of a volcano has caused this Pokémon's body to resemble its environment— it has an organ similar to a magma chamber.

data.name: Magmortar

abilities.name: Magma Surge
abilities.text: During Pokémon Checkup, put 3 more damage counters on your opponent's Burned Pokémon.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: When shooting 3,600 degree Fahrenheit fireballs from its arms, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.
